21  package org.opencastproject.external.common;
22  
23  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.json.Jsons.arr;
24  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.json.Jsons.f;
25  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.json.Jsons.obj;
26  import static com.entwinemedia.fn.data.json.Jsons.v;
27  import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
28  
29  import com.entwinemedia.fn.data.json.JValue;
30  
31  import org.apache.http.HttpStatus;
32  import org.junit.Test;
33  
34  import javax.ws.rs.core.Response;
35  
36  public class ApiResponseBuilderTest {
37  
38    @Test
39    public void testJsonStringOk() throws Exception {
40      Response response = ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_0_0, "body");
41  
42      assertEquals(HttpStatus.SC_OK, response.getStatus());
43      assertEquals("application/v1.0.0+json", response.getMetadata().get("Content-Type").get(0));
44    }
45  
46    @Test
47    public void testJsonOk() throws Exception {
48      final JValue json = obj(f("id", v("abcd")), f("values", arr(v("a"), v("b"))));
49      Response response = ApiResponseBuilder.Json.ok(ApiVersion.VERSION_1_0_0, json);
50  
51      assertEquals(HttpStatus.SC_OK, response.getStatus());
52      assertEquals("application/v1.0.0+json", response.getMetadata().get("Content-Type").get(0));
53    }
54  
55  }
